sentences.en: "I detest clutter, you know." — "I didn't know, but I might have guessed."
sentences.cn: “我特别厌恶杂乱无章，你是知道的。”——“我可不知道，不过我早该猜到了。”

sentences.en: A clutter of dirty dishes filled the sink.
sentences.cn: 洗碗池里堆满了乱七八糟的脏碗碟.

sentences.en: Caroline prefers her worktops to be clear of clutter.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳喜欢把厨房台面收拾得整整齐齐。

sentences.en: Could you get rid of some of that clutter in your bedroom?
sentences.cn: 你能把你卧室那些杂物清理掉一些吗？

sentences.en: Don't clutter the page with too many diagrams.
sentences.cn: 别用太多的图表来堆砌版面。

sentences.en: Empty soft-drink cans clutter the desks.
sentences.cn: 空饮料罐胡乱地堆在桌上。

sentences.en: Her belongings clutter up my bedroom.
sentences.cn: 她的东西乱七八糟堆满在我臥室里.

sentences.en: Her room was in a clutter.
His room is always in a clutter.
sentences.cn: 他的房间总是凌乱不堪.

sentences.en: How can you work with so much clutter on your desk?
sentences.cn: 书桌上有这麽多乱七八糟的东西,你怎麽能工作 呢 ?

sentences.en: I turned aside and looked at the clutter of the household objects.
sentences.cn: 我转过脸去看着那一堆乱七八遭的家用器具.

sentences.en: On the right was a clutter of pipes and debris.
sentences.cn: 右边是乱七八糟的管子和破碎杂物.

sentences.en: Piles of books and papers cluttered his desk.
sentences.cn: 他的书桌堆满了书和文件。

sentences.en: The cat managed to find a spot to sleep amidst all the clutter of my study.
sentences.cn: 猫儿设法在我一片零乱的书房中找了个地方睡觉.

sentences.en: The garage is in such a clutter that we can't find anything.
sentences.cn: 车库如此凌乱,我们什么也找不到.

sentences.en: The only way to get rid of clutter is to get rid of stuff.
sentences.cn: 摆脱混乱的唯一办法就是甩掉没有价值的东西。

sentences.en: This room is so impressive it would be a shame to clutter it up.
sentences.cn: 这个房间布置得太好了，让人不好意思乱放东西。

sentences.en: We'll have to clear up all this clutter.
sentences.cn: 我们得把这一切凌乱的东西整理清楚.

trans.tran_en: a large number of things that are scattered somewhere in an untidy way
to cover or fill a space or room with too many things, so that it looks very untidy

trans.tran_cn: 乱哄哄地跑，发出吵闹声
